title: (Where H = Height of building above ground level) Provisions mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: (Where H = Height of building above ground level) Provisions mentioned in Regulation No.6.2.4 shall be applicable
section: Provisions mentioned in Regulation No.6.23 shall be applicable with following changes -
